changes.change: Major source code cleanup and rework (versions 3.0.2 - 3.0.4 were purely testing betas)
Updated Timeline Tab and UI Fixes
Version Bump/fix crash (Updated Sources, Added Percentage Statistics to Country/State/County Pages)
Added Percentage Statistics to Country/State/County Pages
Combined States, Counties, and Testing into one Tab
Added a map view to the Global Tab
Transitioned from IPA to installable DEB package
